product_description: Designed to meet your everyday storage needs. Cleverstore Clear 32 Quart clear bins with latching lids have a straight wall design that maximizes storage space holding up to 14 percent more than other storage boxes in the same space. name: Sterilite 27 Gal Industrial Tote, Stackable Storage Bin with Snap-Fit Lid for Garage, Basement & Attic Storage, Black Base and Yellow Lily Lid, 6-Pack
short_description: Dimensions & Size: Exterior measures 28 1/2" x 19 5/8" x 15 1/2", with spacious interior dimensions at bottom of 23 3/8" x 14 5/8" x 14 3/4" - perfect for a variety of storage needs.

Sterilite products are proudly made in the USA since 1939 and are BPA and phthalate free.
product_description: Tackle rugged storage needs in the garage, basement, attic or back of a pick-up truck with the heavy-duty Industrial Totes! Be confident that stored items will stay protected in the durable 27 Gallon Industrial Tote, even when on the go. The grooved lid design and keyholes provide options for tie-downs to simplify transportation, and keep totes in place in the back of a pick-up truck. The reinforced, snap-fit lid secures and keeps items contained. Carry the tote with ease using the comfort carrying handles, which make for a sure grip when transporting. The deep recessed lids provide stability when stacking for efficient use of storage space. Made from recycled polypropylene, the base has channeled walls that provide added strength and help to resist crushing under heavier loads. The 27 Gallon Industrial Tote is ideal for more active storage needs - and may be taken on-the-go, fitting in most hitch mounted cargo carriers - store camping equipment, sports gear, tools and workshop supplies, and other bulky items. The overall assembled dimensions of this item are 28 1/2" L x 19 5/8" W x 15 1/2" H.
